radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Computed Tomographic (CT) Angiography of the Chest
radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple pulmonary emboli in the pulmonary arteries in the left lower lobe and right lower lobe; a small wedge-shaped infarction at the left lung base.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Doppler Ultrasound of the Left Leg
radiographic_examinations.findings: Deep-vein thrombosis of the left common femoral vein extending into the tibial trunk.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT Scan of the Abdomen and Pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Deep-vein thrombosis in the left common, external, and internal iliac veins extending into the common femoral vein.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Repeat Doppler Ultrasound of the Left Leg
radiographic_examinations.findings: Nonocclusive deep-vein thrombosis involving the left femoral, popliteal, and calf veins; decreased respiratory variability in the Doppler waveforms of the left common and external iliac veins.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Indicated progression of the condition with recurrent deep-vein thrombosis.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Complete occlusion of the iliac veins with an extensive network of collaterals.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Confirmed the diagnosis of Mayâ€“Thurner syndrome.
